dict.acceptation: 很，非常；恰好是，正是；十足的；特有的；

sent.trans: very流行的条码组成的软件。

sent.orig: I really am one very shameless, very obscene, very mean, very dreadful, very a bastard's person!
sent.trans: 我真的是一个不止羞耻，很下流，很吝啬，糟透了的私生子罢了！

sent.orig: It was very small, very dark, very ugly, very incommodious.
sent.trans: 它很窄小，很阴暗，很丑陋，很不方便。

sent.orig: I'm very very very very angry now!
sent.trans: 我现在可是非常非常的愤怒！

sent.orig: It was very strange, very sad, very grim, very horrible.
sent.trans: 这真是非常奇怪、非常可悲、非常可恼、非常可怕呀。
